paragraphs: MeAll Tech is a data privacy company that is fueled by open source and data ownership rights. We are dedicated to building products that empower individuals to take control of their own data.
We are currently developing Edgebox, a privacy-focused server operating system that runs open source apps and gives users back their data and privacy settings.
By leveraging open source protocols and solutions, we aim to provide alternative solutions that root themselves in privacy and data ownership principles.
name: MeAll Tech
